gap-ja.title: The Initiator
gap-ja.tagline: Bold beginnings sparked by instinct and speed.

eul-chuk.title: The Cultivator
eul-chuk.tagline: Quiet growth through patience and care.

byeong-in.title: The Visionary Spark
pitfalls: May lose focus after the initial excitement

jeong-myo.title: The Gentle Illuminator
jeong-myo.tagline: Soft light that guides without force.

mu-jin.title: The Stabilizer
mu-jin.tagline: Holding the center when things shift.
pitfalls: May carry too much responsibility alone

gi-sa.title: The Strategic Observer
gi-sa.tagline: Moves after seeing the whole picture.
strengths: Able to anticipate outcomes before acting
pitfalls: Delayed action due to excessive analysis
May miss opportunities by waiting too long

gyeong-o.title: The Unyielding Charger
gyeong-o.tagline: Direct, resilient energy that pushes forward without hesitation.
pitfalls: Can push too hard without rest
gyeong-o.adviceTone: Firm but supportive. Encourages pacing, strategic rest, and awareness of long-term sustainability.

animal.name: Metal Horse
traits: Unyielding once a path is chosen

sin-mi.title: The Refined Guardian
sin-mi.tagline: Protective strength expressed through care and precision.
strengths: Strong sense of duty and protection
pitfalls: Can carry others’ burdens too long
sin-mi.adviceTone: Gentle but structured. Emphasizes boundaries, self-care, and gradual adjustments.

im-sin.title: The Strategic Navigator
im-sin.tagline: Adaptive intelligence that thrives in complexity and motion.
strengths: Excels at connecting ideas and people
pitfalls: May scatter energy across too many paths
im-sin.adviceTone: Flexible and exploratory. Helps narrow focus and prioritize without restricting movement.

gye-yu.title: The Precise Analyst
gye-yu.tagline: Sharp perception refined through quiet observation.
gye-yu.adviceTone: Clear, concise, and factual. Encourages trusting insight without over-polishing.

gap-sul.title: The Principled Defender
gap-sul.tagline: Upholds values with steady courage and integrity.
gap-sul.adviceTone: Honest and grounding. Encourages flexibility while preserving core values.

eul-hae.title: The Gentle Idealist
eul-hae.tagline: Soft persistence guided by quiet belief.
pitfalls: May absorb others' emotions too deeply
Can drift when direction is unclear
eul-hae.adviceTone: Warm and reassuring. Focuses on grounding ideals into practical next steps.

animal.name: Wood Pig
traits: Moves steadily toward comfort and safety

byeong-ja.title: The Igniting Pioneer
byeong-ja.tagline: Bright initiative that sparks movement and opportunity.
pitfalls: Risk of impatience with slow progress
byeong-ja.adviceTone: Encouraging and focusing. Helps channel raw energy into clear, sustainable direction.

jeong-chuk.title: The Quiet Sustainer
jeong-chuk.tagline: Inner warmth expressed through steady commitment.
jeong-chuk.adviceTone: Supportive and reassuring. Encourages self-care and gradual recalibration.

mu-in.title: The Grounded Challenger
mu-in.tagline: Solid presence that meets pressure head-on.
mu-in.adviceTone: Direct and stabilizing. Focuses on standing firm while remaining adaptable.

gi-myo.title: The Harmonizing Anchor
gi-myo.tagline: Quiet strength that stabilizes through balance.
pitfalls: Can delay decisions to preserve harmony
gi-myo.adviceTone: Gentle and centering. Encourages small, steady adjustments rather than drastic change.

gyeong-jin.title: The Resolute Architect
gyeong-jin.tagline: Builds durable structures through discipline and clarity.
strengths: Clear sense of hierarchy and roles
gyeong-jin.adviceTone: Clear and structured. Focuses on systems, priorities, and practical frameworks.

sin-sa.title: The Silent Tactician
sin-sa.tagline: Sharp insight applied with restraint and precision.
sin-sa.adviceTone: Measured and analytical. Encourages strategic transparency and timely action.

im-o.title: The Ocean Rider
im-o.tagline: Big energy that moves fast, adapts fast, and learns by motion.
strengths: Moves quickly from idea to action
pitfalls: Can feel restless with slow progress
im-o.adviceTone: Energizing but grounding. Encourages pacing, prioritization, and smart recovery.

gye-mi.title: The Soft Navigator
gye-mi.tagline: Gentle intuition with strong emotional intelligence and timing.
strengths: Good at choosing the right timing
pitfalls: Can absorb others’ emotions too deeply
Risk of drifting without a clear anchor
gye-mi.adviceTone: Warm and clarifying. Helps translate feelings into concrete next steps and boundaries.

gap-sin.title: The Bold Connector
gap-sin.tagline: Direct growth energy that thrives in networks, ideas, and movement.
strengths: Quick to build relationships and momentum
Strong drive to expand skills and options
pitfalls: Can chase novelty instead of depth
Sometimes commits late after exploring too much
gap-sin.adviceTone: Practical and focusing. Encourages picking one clear direction while keeping healthy flexibility.

eul-yu.title: The Polished Observer
eul-yu.tagline: Quiet refinement with sharp eyes for detail and improvement.
strengths: Strong sense of style and clarity
pitfalls: Sensitive to messy environments or uncertainty
eul-yu.adviceTone: Clear and constructive. Helps choose the ‘good enough’ next step and build momentum.

byeong-sul.title: The Bright Protector
byeong-sul.tagline: Warm leadership that defends values and keeps the team moving.
strengths: Strong protective instincts for people and goals
pitfalls: May become reactive when boundaries are crossed
Risk of burning energy for others
byeong-sul.adviceTone: Supportive and motivating. Encourages clear boundaries and sustainable leadership habits.

jeong-hae.title: The Quiet Healer
jeong-hae.tagline: Soft warmth that restores, reassures, and helps others feel safe.
strengths: Good at soothing conflict and stress
pitfalls: Can avoid direct confrontation too long
jeong-hae.adviceTone: Warm and reassuring. Offers gentle structure: boundaries, small steps, and steady self-care.

mu-ja.title: The Steady Controller
mu-ja.tagline: Grounded authority that stabilizes chaos and sets direction.
strengths: Good at setting priorities and structure
pitfalls: May underestimate emotions in decision making
Difficulty delegating when trust is low
mu-ja.adviceTone: Firm and practical. Focuses on systems, priorities, and consistent execution.

gi-chuk.title: The Patient Foundation
gi-chuk.tagline: Slow strength that builds outcomes you can rely on.
pitfalls: Slow to pivot when conditions shift
gi-chuk.adviceTone: Steady and reassuring. Encourages small, sustainable upgrades and clear boundaries.

gyeong-in.title: The Steel Challenger
gyeong-in.tagline: Sharp courage that cuts through obstacles with clarity.
pitfalls: May push too hard without rest
Risk of rigidity when emotions run high
gyeong-in.adviceTone: Direct and precise. Encourages thoughtful action, healthy pacing, and strategic flexibility.

sin-myo.title: The Elegant Judge
sin-myo.tagline: Refined standards with a strong sense of balance and fairness.
strengths: Strong eye for quality and alignment
Good at maintaining harmony with structure
Clear sense of what fits (and what doesn’t)
sin-myo.adviceTone: Clear and constructive. Helps simplify choices and reduce perfection-driven delay.

im-jin.title: The Deep Catalyst
im-jin.tagline: Big-picture force that reshapes direction through insight and courage.
strengths: Can lead change when others hesitate
pitfalls: May take on too much responsibility
Needs recovery time after big pushes
im-jin.adviceTone: Visionary but grounded. Focuses on sustainable change, not force or urgency.

gye-sa.title: The Adaptive Strategist
gye-sa.tagline: Subtle intuition paired with precise, deliberate action.
strengths: Quickly reads subtle changes in situations
Able to concentrate deeply once committed
pitfalls: Mental and emotional energy can drain quickly
Tendency to overthink before making final decisions
High self-expectations can lead to quiet burnout
gye-sa.adviceTone: Offers calm, grounded guidance. Avoids absolutes, presents two or three realistic options, and encourages steady, sustainable choices rather than impulsive moves.

animal.name: Water Snake
traits: Moves only when the outcome is efficient

gap-o.title: The Forward Pioneer
gap-o.tagline: Bold growth energy that thrives on speed, freedom, and challenge.
gap-o.adviceTone: Motivating and grounding. Encourages pacing, clarity of goals, and sustainable growth.

eul-mi.title: The Gentle Nurturer
eul-mi.tagline: Steady growth shaped by care, patience, and emotional awareness.
pitfalls: May delay action to keep peace
eul-mi.adviceTone: Warm and stabilizing. Focuses on boundaries and small, reliable steps.

byeong-sin.title: The Energetic Explorer
byeong-sin.tagline: Bright curiosity expressed through bold experimentation.
strengths: Fast learner through trial and error
byeong-sin.adviceTone: Upbeat and focusing. Encourages choosing one clear direction to commit to.

jeong-yu.title: The Warm Refiner
jeong-yu.tagline: Soft intensity that improves, polishes, and completes.
jeong-yu.adviceTone: Supportive and precise. Encourages progress without perfection paralysis.

mu-sul.title: The Grounded Guardian
mu-sul.tagline: Stable courage that protects values and people.
mu-sul.adviceTone: Honest and steady. Emphasizes boundaries and long-term stability.

gi-hae.title: The Quiet Restorer
gi-hae.tagline: Gentle stability that restores balance and safety.
gi-hae.adviceTone: Warm and reassuring. Focuses on rest, boundaries, and steady recovery.

gyeong-ja.title: The Precise Starter
gyeong-ja.tagline: Clear judgment that initiates action without hesitation.
gyeong-ja.adviceTone: Direct and structured. Offers clear options and next steps.

sin-chuk.title: The Structured Pillar

sin-chuk.adviceTone: Steady and practical. Encourages flexibility within structure.

gap-jin.tagline: Growth-focused vision that builds scalable foundations.

jeong-mi.title: The Gentle Flame

strengths: Steady dedication to people and goals
jeong-mi.adviceTone: Reassuring and supportive. Focuses on boundaries and sustainable giving.

mu-sin.tagline: Grounded thinking that adapts quickly to changing situations.

gye-chuk.tagline: Slow, persistent progress shaped by inner resolve.

gap-in.tagline: Bold expansion driven by courage and instinct.
